events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived yet. The tracking info hasn't updated for days.
The issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay due to customer mentioning late shipment and tracking delays.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah Thompson to handle the delayed delivery inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear your package hasn't arrived yet. I'll look into this for you right away.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can track your package in more detail?
Sure, my order number is 8745623, and it was supposed to be delivered to 123 Elm Street, Springfield.
I checked with the courier service and your package is currently delayed due to unforeseen logistical issues. We expect delivery within 3 more days.
This delay is really disappointing as I needed the product urgently. I hope it will arrive on time this time.
As an apology for the delay, we will upgrade your shipping to express at no extra cost once it ships again.
Thank you for the upgrade offer. That helps a lot. I appreciate the assistance.
Your shipping method has been upgraded to express and your package is now prioritized for delivery. We will notify you when it ships.
We are following up to confirm your package was delivered successfully. Please let us know if you have any other questions or issues.
Yes, my package arrived this morning and everything is perfect. Thank you for your help and quick response.
We are glad to hear your package arrived and have now closed this case. Thank you for contacting support.
